abstract: Determines whether people can interact with this control.

declaration.code: @MainActor @preconcurrency func disabled(_ disabled: Bool) -> some ControlWidgetTemplate

overview:
## Discussion

Controls also respect the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/View/disabled(_:)] modifier applied to the control’s label. That modifier only disables the label, however. To disable the control overall, apply this modifier to the control template:
title: disabled(_:)
